synopsis.text: What transpires in the OVA is a flashback to a year before the main anime, when the upright Kujaku Nijou first becomes a part of the Special 7 team. This episode, included in the second Blu-ray volume, sheds light on Nijou's early days with the squad. As Nanatsuki stumbles upon a file detailing Nijou's first case with the group, a shocking revelation comes to light: Nijou was once detained for interrogation! This intriguing twist leaves viewers eager to uncover the events that led to the normally law-abiding Nijou falling under scrutiny.
